artist: Author: After the Fall Collective; Publisher: CrimethInc. Worker Collective
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Loose, folded leaves of newsprint, photomechanical illustration of two groups of figures (both nude, one male and the othe female) with red text printed in color and black-and-white offset lithography; 14 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; loose, folded leaves
title: After the Fall
